content: Congratulations.

We are official part
owners of the bar!

Ah!
SCHMIDT:
Yes!

Sir, we won't
let you down.
I'm just a notary.
Hey, the note... arize.

All right, we're not gonna
let you down.

It's gonna be a little weird,
you know, me working for you.

No, no, babe. We're
gonna keep it separate.
Ass-Strat's my day job.

I'm more of a
"show up late night

with my Argentinian friends"
type of owner.

Nick's in charge.
He's got it.
Okay.

Look, it's all about finesse.
Watch.

The trick is,
is you get super close,
but then you pull back.
Watch how Daddy does it.
Oh, no!

(Javier laughs)

back pat. I needed that.
What?

You have to have beer
on the bar,
Uh-huh.

because that's
what makes it stick.

So now I can do it

Don't count that first one.

Don't count
that first one.
Okay.
Hey.

Look at that.
What a game, right?

It's up to you

Oh, yeah,

What you need to do

Establish yourself

Within every man

What's-what's

What do you mean?
Your rib cage has give.

You know, KC still hasn't

I've been on five dates
with her... five dates,

and I still don't
know where I stand.
New relationships are so hard!
They take so much work.
So much work. It's like...

it's like making a risotto;
a risotto in your heart.

Mm.
Hmm.
Aw. What's that for?
Just 'cause.

Aw.
Mmm.
How great is that?

So great.

So comfy, so warm.
Like a port in the storm.

Mm-hmm.
You're gonna

You just got to...

You're looking

Mm-hmm.

I'm gonna hit the

Thank you.
Thank you for inviting me.

Oh, that was fast.

We're Flip and Nancy.

Fred's parents.
Mm.
Oh! (chuckles)
Fred lives with his parents.

Now I see

And his house. (chuckles)
Guys, seriously.
I'm... I'm not hungry.

You can't watch the movie

Hey, cool your jets until
you have some of our coffee.
Beans are from Portland.

Oh, that's funny. (chuckles)
I'm from Portland.

Do you know my last book signing
was at Powell's Books?

Oh, no way.
You're-you're a writer?

Well, I'm just a fool

Oh, you're just

And you are

Oh.
(giggles)
You guys are so sweet together.

That's because we're still

35 wonderful years
of marriage.

Feels like
two to me.
Oh.

NANCY: Feels like one.
FLIP: Like we just met.

CECE:
Nick, what are we doing here?
(laughter)
(both clear throats)
Each-each of you know me.
Yeah.

If you don't,
my name is Nicholas Miller.

I'm an American
from Chicago.

I'm your new boss,
so you'll do what I say.

When the cave people
went to the cave bar,

and they asked
for a drink on the rocks,

they actually meant it.
(laughs)
Now that we're all laughing...
It says, "Wait for laughs."
(sighs) I...
Anybody have any questions?
I have a question.
Please. Anything.
Your mother.
(laughter)
Your mother. I love it.

Thank you
for breaking the ice.

I know!
(laughter)
I must look so stupid!

"Hey, get over here.
I got a meeting."
What an idiot, huh?
It was that bad, huh?
No, Birdm was bad.
This... this was a disaster.

I'm here to help you, okay?
Look, I have over nearly

ten years of experience
in the corporate world.
What's "over nearly ten"?

"Nearly ten" would be
eight or nine years.

I have... I have
over nine years.
That's different, yeah.

Got you a tie.
Corporate 101.

Dress better than
your employees.

Reminds them that
they're inferior.

I'd wear a tie,
but only on my butt,
like it were a tail.
A tail tie.
Furguson, you have a knot!
That salt water in here?

You been hanging
down at the wharf again?
Guess what.

I took a chance with that
guy Fred, and I'm in love.
That's incredible.

With his parents,
but I'm in love!
Furguson, clear my schedule.
I need a word with your sister.

When Nancy was in Zimbabwe

Flip dropped everything to go

You seem like you're on cocaine.

Yeah, right. Flip and
Nancy and I hate drugs.

Okay, yeah, great.
What do you like about Fred?

Well, I didn't really

Hey, do not talk to me

But if you really want
to be in a relationship...

Then I have to get to know
Fred. Ha! You know what?

Tomorrow, I'm gonna just crack

You know what's
a good date?
Hmm?
Errands and a smoothie.

Okay, everyone,
listen up.

Here are your
new uniforms.
Oh, you got to be kidding.

Save your groans

From now on, we will
measure drinks.
Oh, man.

And we have a new
one-napkin policy.
Just one napkin?

Questions at

Should somebody ask you

you just say,
"Are you sure?"

Nine times out of ten, they'll

Now please go try
on your new polos.
(all groaning, murmuring)
Can I have a word with you?

You need to rule with

You're not suggesting

I'm not doing it!
They're my friends!

Ooh!

I never thought

give me the tie.
Now we're talking.
No mercy.
Corporate leader is born.

Don't-don't put it

Well, hello to you. Hi.
Hi!

Fred'll be right down.
You know, Nan and I are just

A park day?!

You should come!
Well, look, um,

with, uh, this one.

When can chill with my parents.
Okay.

Yes!
Oh! Great!

Here's some paint.
Coffee?

I feel like

Yeah, well, you look
like a prince.
Now, go. Go be a boss.
Hey, Cece.
Um, we measure our drinks now.
Am I right?
So, uh, do as I say.

(laughs)
Of course. Use the thing.

Sorry, just, you know,
it's important.

You know, with the...
consist...

Is this the exact thing that
you wanted to have happen?

I wouldn't want to get
anything on my new uniform.
That's, like, six shots.
So you have to charge...
That was some sass.

You're at a real
crossroads here.

This is a big
moment for you.

There is no fear
in this dojo!

NICK:
Hey, Javier?
Where's-where's your shirt?
Oh, it's so crazy, Nick.

Someone broke into

(chuckles):
Yeah...
I don't believe that.

I need you to put it

I mean it. Do not...

Javier, wait.

But can we just take a

I mean, the effect that

I can't believe...

I mean... like, what?

Boy, Furguson,

We are in a hairy situation,

JESS (laughing):
I know! Really!

Oh, it's just,

Nice to see you.

Join us.
Jess, a moment?

Jess, what the hell

They're just the most

What happened to the

Go get some cheese for the wine.

You know...
I can be shy sometimes, too.

You don't have

Seriously, I-I'd really

Really?

Here's something that I learned

When you feel

I don't think that it's Furgy's

Ooh.

I think that the knot

(sighs)
Uh, wow, I, um...

I don't know

because I am ashamed.

Aw...
Did he just

Yeah, that's what I said.
Ashamed...

of being beautiful?
Of being a man?
Of being passionate?
Ha! Then I'm ashamed, too.
I say to you...
let her in.

(quietly):
Yes.
All together now.

On the count of three? Oh.
Let her in.

Let her in.
No counting.
Okay, just go.

That's good,

All kinds of cheese.

(quietly):

No!

You are my rock right now.
Do you need anything?

No, I'm good, babe.

MAN: Hey!
Shut up! I'm trying my hardest!
I shouldn't have fired Javier.

I got to apologize.
This is all my fault.

Obviously, this is your fault...

the rest of the staff

That's a great idea.

Shut up!

Well, I wonder

Hmm.

Slow night.

Miss Officer, can we go?
